template.name: Template App Flussonic v3
template.description: Monitoring Flussonic Author: Eynikov S.V. E-mail: semeneynikov@gmail.com

trigger.name: Количество клиентов превысило пороговое значение > {$FL.MAX_TOTAL_CLIENTS}
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. The number of clients has exceeded the threshold {$FL.MAX_TOTAL_CLIENTS}

trigger.name: Количество потоков превышает значение макроса {$FL.LIMIT_STREAMS}
trigger.description: The number of streams exceeds the macro value. The macro value must be > {$FL.LIMIT_STREAMS}

trigger.name: Служба Flussonic перезапущена (Время работы меньше 10 минут)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Uptime is less than 10 minutes

trigger.expression: (last(/Template App Flussonic v3/flussonic.version,#1)<>last(/Template App Flussonic v3/flussonic.version,#2))=1 and length(last(/Template App Flussonic v3/flussonic.version))>0
trigger.name: Изменилась версия Flussonic

trigger_prototype.expression: avg(/Template App Flussonic v3/stream[{#STREAM_NAME},alive],#2)=0 and last(/Template App Flussonic v3/stream[{#STREAM_NAME},running])=1
trigger_prototype.name: Поток "{#STREAM_NAME}" не работает

trigger_prototype.expression: (last(/Template App Flussonic v3/stream[{#STREAM_NAME},url],#1)<>last(/Template App Flussonic v3/stream[{#STREAM_NAME},url],#2))=1 and last(/Template App Flussonic v3/stream[{#STREAM_NAME},running])=1
trigger_prototype.name: Поток "{#STREAM_NAME}" сменился источник потока
